EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-09-15-CAE-SanFran-091917-Confirmation.ES-2017-09-15-CAE-SanFran-091917-C
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic Giants Game - Ticket Info
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
I hope you are as excited as I am to hang out with the Turbonomic crew Tuesday evening at AT&T Park as the Giants take on the Rockies! I am reaching out to provide you with some final details to ensure you find your way to Suite 48. I have your ticket, and from 6:00 p.m. until 6:45 p.m. I will wait in front of the Willie Mays Statue at the Willie Mays Plaza Entrance (located at the corner of Third and Kings St.). I will be wearing a Turbonomic t-shirt so I'm easy to find, and will personally hand you your ticket. Then you are free to head up to Suite 48! If you cannot arrive by 6:45 p.m., please email me and let me know so I may leave your ticket at Will-Call. <[[https://turbonomic.com/san-francisco-community-appreciation-giants-vs-rockies/]]> Tuesday, September 19th 7:15pm EST Where: AT&T Park <[[http://sanfrancisco.giants.mlb.com/sf/downloads/y2015/seating_streets.pdf]]> San Francisco Giants vs Colorado Rockies 24 Willie Mays Plaza, San Francisco, CA 94107
Click here for additional park information <[[http://sanfrancisco.giants.mlb.com/sf/ballpark/information/index.jsp?content=AZguide#entrances]]>
See you soon! Catherine
Catherine Kellogg Sr. Marketing Program Manager Turbonomic, Inc.
